meanings.definition: A person who behaves in an extravagant way in order to attract attention.
meanings.sent1: The exhibitionist at the party wore a bright, sparkly outfit to stand out.
meanings.sent2: The singer was known to be an exhibitionist on stage, always wearing flashy costumes.
meanings.sent3: The exhibitionist in the group always made sure to have the loudest laugh to get noticed.
meanings.sent4: Her bold choice of colors in her paintings made her an exhibitionist among the artists.
meanings.sent5: The little girl was an exhibitionist, always dancing in the center of the room to be seen.

meanings.definition: A person who enjoys showing off their body in a sexual manner.
meanings.sent1: The beach exhibitionist flaunted his physique in a tiny swimsuit.
meanings.sent2: She was labeled an exhibitionist for sunbathing topless at the public pool.
meanings.sent3: The exhibitionist shocked everyone by skinny-dipping in the freezing lake.
meanings.sent4: The gym exhibitionist always made sure to wear the tightest workout clothes.
meanings.sent5: The model was known as an exhibitionist for her daring photoshoots.
